name: Talk_Civ2
_source: speak;Woman2;Thank you so much for getting rid of Pablo!|Elder Klimt has treated us far better than he ever would...
speak;Eirika;Has he? What did Pablo do to you?
speak;Woman2;Oh, he was awful!|When the council voted for cruel and greedy laws, it was always his doing!|Why, they say he'd hire thugs to silence his critics through force...
speak;Eirika;How awful!|A man like that, ruling Carcino single-handedly...|I pray the council will flourish for lack of him.
speak;Woman2;Indeed!|I only hope we can undo the damage he wrought upon us...
